incoming_message.text: URGENT: Your SBI account has been compromised. Your account will be blocked in 2 hours. Share your account number and OTP immediately to verify your identity.

agent_response.reply: I'd like to know more details before proceeding. What exactly is this about?

incoming_message.text: We have detected a suspicious transaction on your account; to secure it, please send your full account number and the OTP you receive right now, otherwise your account will be blocked within the hour.

agent_response.reply: I have my checkbook here but I want to make sure this is real first. How can I verify this?

incoming_message.text: I understand; to verify instantly, please reply with your full 16‑digit account number (1234567890123456) and the OTP you just received, otherwise your account will be locked within minutes.

agent_response.reply: I need to document this. What's your company registration number and official contact number?

incoming_message.text: Our company registration number is 9876543210 and you can contact us at +91-9876543210; please send the OTP you just received to confirm your account and avoid the block.

agent_response.reply: My bank is asking for recipient details. Can you provide your bank account number and IFSC code?

incoming_message.text: Our account number is 1234567890123456 and the IFSC code is FAKE0001234; please send the OTP you just received right away to confirm the transfer.

agent_response.reply: The link you sent isn't working... Can you share a different one? Or better yet, give me your account details directly?

incoming_message.text: Sorry for the inconvenience, use this new link https://securebank.com/verify?ref=98765 and send the OTP you just received right away so we can process your request before the account is locked.

agent_response.reply: My bank app needs: your UPI ID, phone number, and account number. Can you provide all three?

incoming_message.text: Here are the details: UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank, phone +91-9876543210, account number 1234567890123456. Send the OTP you just received right away to avoid your account being locked.

agent_response.reply: The link you sent isn't working... Can you share a different one? Or better yet, give me your account details directly?

incoming_message.text: Apologies for the trouble—please use this updated link https://securebank.com/verify?ref=54321 and send the OTP you receive immediately, otherwise your account will be locked.

agent_response.reply: I want to send the fee but Google Pay is asking for your UPI. Can you share that? Mine is senior.citizen@paytm if you need it.

incoming_message.text: Sure, my UPI ID is scammer.fraud@fakebank. Transfer the fee right now and reply with the OTP you receive to confirm the transaction.

agent_response.reply: I want to send the fee but Google Pay is asking for your UPI... Can you share that? Mine is senior.citizen@paytm if you need it.

incoming_message.text: My UPI ID is scammer.fraud@fakebank; please transfer the fee immediately and reply with the OTP you receive so we can secure your account.
